events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their updated resume and cover letter.
The candidate's profile has been reviewed and categorised under the engineering department focusing on backend development roles.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's journey through the software engineer recruitment process.
The initial phone screening was conducted to assess the candidateâ€™s technical background and cultural fit for the engineering team.
Candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm, confirming availability for a technical interview and expressing strong interest in the position.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on June 15th to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
